website_summaries.verdict: A quality addition to sneak into any salad, smoothie, or baked good.
pros: The Just Hemp Foods brand had a subtle taste that was easily masked in any dish that we added them to
Contains a significant amount of protein
An efficient way to pack in the health benefits without compromising taste
cons: There were a few hulls left in the bag

customer_reviews.title: Very healthy
customer_reviews.text: This item is great for vegetarians. It has over ten vitamins, as well as omegas, which we need. I need protein for weightlifting and this supplies some of my protein needs, when I remember to eat it. It's a little bitter, but that's to be expected. I try to eat it with bananas or other food if possible. It's not as bitter as Chinese medicine, that's for sure! For some reason I bought some other type of hemp seeds and they had most of their vitamins stripped from them, so this is the best deal I've been able to found so far. Beats all other competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Man

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product. Fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast and very fresh. The best by date is over a year away. Immediately tasted them and they’re delicious! Very good quality, with a perfect consistency. Note that all the 1-star reviews are from three years ago- and more than one complains of packaging. Yes- the zipper seal bag was not of the highest quality but the product within is what really matters. We repackaged them in three pint mason jars for better shelf life. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C**** **ll

customer_reviews.title: I have enjoyed learning how to make hemp milk with this product
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed learning how to make hemp milk with this product. I use to make raw, organic almond milk... pretty pricey. 1 cup of hemp to 4 cups of distilled water, a pinch of sea salt, perhaps a little liquid stevia, liquid vitamin d3. Add a little organic, non- alcohol almond or vanilla.... yummmm. Makes a full jug of nut milk. No need to strain. For smoothies... use a 1/4 cup. No need to add milks or nut butters. For raw, creamy soups... 1/4 hemp, tbl. spoon miso, olive oil, smoked paprika, nutritional yeast, some plant... fresh ground pepper. Hot water. Blend. Very convenient. Great for my morning coffee!
customer_reviews.author: veggiemystic

customer_reviews.title: A delicious and very versatile, wholesome ingredient!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely delicious! They have the flavor characteristics to that of raw, unroasted sunflower kernels. The texture is creamy, soft and plump. Not at all hard, nor dry. The opposite of chia seeds. I could easily eat these with nut milk, like I would cereal. I've used them in smoothies, and the results are excellent. I've decided to add these to a batch of moist granola bars as well. These can be an excellent added source of wholesome nutrition, in a wide variety of ways. I highly recommend this product and brand.
customer_reviews.author: P. Schlegel

customer_reviews.title: Nutty Goodness
customer_reviews.text: My dad's been eating whole shelled hemp seeds my whole life, and though he's always tried to sell me on them they've always been a bit hard for me to chew and digest. Whole seeds are thought to have a greater source of minerals and beneficial fibre, but these hulled seeds are so versatile that I find myself pouring some in just about everything, making them the better choice of the two for me. This brand of hulled hemp is particularly fresh tasting with no odd aftertaste that I've had with other seeds. I sprinkle/scoop on smoothies, atop salads, yogurt, stirfrys, ect. adding a nutty and healthful kick to everything!
customer_reviews.author: Masha

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: To be upfront this was my first hemp food product. Overall like the Just Hemp Foods hulled hemp seeds. Not knowing any better they taste like a cross between pine and sunflower seeds. Overall the product lasted quite a while. Used primarily as breakfast sprinkle over yogurt. Believe in general hemp food products are over priced, including this product. My only gripe which is no fault of the product is that it was shipped with pesticide also bought at the same time, and despite asking for separate shipping Amazon lumped both products in same box.
customer_reviews.author: milgrade

customer_reviews.title: Just Hemp!
customer_reviews.text: My Go To, for Hemp Seeds,.. 1.5 lbs for a good price as compared to others. But if they get swollen heads and raise it,.. I'll be saying the same for who beats THEIR Price. That having been said,.. I REALLY feel the difference since including this in My Nutri Ninja concoctions (lol) And the abundant Omega-3's, 6's, and 9's,.. really seem to be easing discomfort in My 35+ years of construction and injury battered joints. While ALSO adding greatly to energy levels,.. AND over-all sense of well being. Just seems to keep Me in a much more upbeat and uplifted, positive mood.
customer_reviews.author: BKWeber

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, and ready to eat
customer_reviews.text: 1st hemp seeds ever for me. They taste great, kind of like an almond, nice mild nutty flavor. They are ready to eat, and are just the nutty paet of the seed, hense "hulled." I add them to oatmeal or cream of wheat along with chia and flax seeds for all those good omega 3s. These have twice as much omega 6 as omega 3 but I eat vegan with very little oil so it's all good. Good protien source also. Come in a nice resealable bag. I keep then in the fridge as directed.
customer_reviews.author: D Toth

customer_reviews.title: Soft Snack!
customer_reviews.text: I've been following the Paleo diet for nearly a year now and occasionally have a craving for food that is soft like bread, rolls, etc. (Grains/flour are a no-no when following Paleo.) Hemp seed has a nice flavor and softness to it, so I sometimes eat the seeds (recommended serving) as a single snack. They are delicious over salad and, oddly, good in eggs. My breakfast is always heavy on protein, and they're a great way to add more protein to a meal.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fiest

customer_reviews.title: These hemp-hearts stole my heart
customer_reviews.text: The quality is superb!! The size for the price is the best I have found for this same type of product. Not only are they fresh, but they taste great on their own. I add these to my Acai bowls, but I can't wait to try them in my greek yogurt, trail mix, granola or smoothies. They offer great nutritional value for us vegetarians as a way to get in those extra vitamins and minerals such as 10 grams of complete protein and 3 grams of omega 3's. Just what the doctor ordered. These truly are a hidden gem. I WILL be a repeat customer. Truly awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: You can do a lot with these little seeds much to my surprise. I put them raw on yogurt, add them to salad, fruit, cereal, use them like bread crumbs, and eat them raw. I store them in the refrigerator to maintain the freshness. I will be buying more and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EvaluatorTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fresh taste!
customer_reviews.text: They advertise a small batch processing and attention to yield.. and they absolutely delivered! Fantastic taste and freshly packaged. These hemp seeds are great on and in everything from soups, salads, meatballs, breads and just about anything you want to add a slight crunch/sunflower taste to.. if you're hesitating.. just buy this product! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Notice2Vacate

customer_reviews.title: Very Fresh, Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: These little hemp hearts are so fresh. I love the taste of them and when I open up the bag they have a lovely lemony fragrance. I am including these as part of a special diet I am on and my health has greatly improved overall. I recommend these to anyone considering Hemp and I will definitely be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: VMK

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and addictive!
customer_reviews.text: These hulled hemp seeds are amazing. I already purchased it twice. I love the subtle nutty taste - it's actually really good! I love to add this to my oatmeal in the morning, salad at lunch, and sometimes on brown rice or quinoa. I am now sort of addicted to these. I am constantly looking forward to adding it to pretty much anything I eat! It is packed with protein and omega-3's. Your body will thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: The best Hemp you'll find.
customer_reviews.text: WOW. This the best actually HULLED hemp I've found. Most Hemp says it's hulled, but then is filled with hard hulls!! This one is true to it's packaging and they Hemp is nice and flavorful and a great texture. I would recommend this over other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for dairy-free smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for dairy-free smoothies. I don't bother to make 'milk' and store it from this. Instead I simply add the daily suggested amount to my smoothie with coconut water and it provides a sweet nutty base for any fruit or veggies I want to add to the smoothie. Store in the fridge to maintain freshness.
customer_reviews.author: Kitchen Sink

customer_reviews.title: I've been very pleased. Be aware that in anything short of a ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this to increase the protein in my program, because I'm avoiding Migraine triggers (MSG, nuts, dairy, etc.). So far, I've been very pleased. Be aware that in anything short of a vitamix, this will maintain a seedy texture. I like running into some texture, but for those who want a truly smooth drink, this would not be a good additive. It also works well on salads, but you really can't chew it into smaller pieces. It is a very small-grained size already, and you're going to end up swallowing it as is. I like it alot.
customer_reviews.author: Mom by Love

customer_reviews.title: I am trying to eat healhier and studied better eating habits
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to eat healhier and studied better eating habits. I learned that seeds are a good source of protein and a healthy choice. Got this package and tasted the seeds...not great as a snack, simply too small, but what I do is when I'm having a small, quick, lunch, I put a couple of spoonfuls into a yogurt and bam, better meal. Flavor is different, pleasant. Lasts a while as an unrefridgerated item...i'm pleased with the hemp seeds and will continue to eat them.
customer_reviews.author: David Witkus

customer_reviews.title: Hemp!!!! Such an amazing and diverse plant offering so much!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT deal on hemp seeds best price I have found yet. Great quality too. I usually get nutiva Hemp seeds and these are the exact same quality as nutiva and at least When I ordered was the best price! If you have not tried hemp seeds before you they are a very small heart of the seed that is soft and has a light nutty type flavor maybe like a light sunflower seed and softer. They are great for adding lots of nutrition to a salad, smoothie or trail mix, even breads and meals like meatloaf/hamburgers etc. or just eating straight up. Great for pets too! Chickens, goats, dogs. All love them.
customer_reviews.author: NaturallyMama

customer_reviews.title: just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I blend these when making salad dressings sauces and dips for a creamy texture rather than adding oils or vegan mayo. They perform beautifully. At this price I am one deliciously happy chick ! !
customer_reviews.author: creole 170

customer_reviews.title: They do what I got them for.
customer_reviews.text: I got them because I'd read that hemp seeds are good for their omega fatty acids and for their ability to lower one's blood pressure. They do so much for my bp that I'll keep taking them. They do what I got them for.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E. Chase

customer_reviews.title: Great sub for omega supplements
customer_reviews.text: After reading many articles on the benefits of hemp seeds, I had to try them myself. They are tasty right from the bag, resembling sesame seeds, they are softer in texture and slightly nutty in flavor. I've mixed these into oatmeal, and sprinkled on salads. Flavor wise, they do not add much, but I am hoping the omegas are doing all the good work for my body. I enjoy eating my nutrients as opposed to swallowing a vitamin everyday, so this replaces my omega supplement.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, watch for pieces of hull though
customer_reviews.text: These are very fresh and tasty, the package is good for keeping it fresh. (I keep them in the refrigerator though, as hemp will start to taste sour if not used quickly or refrigerated.) The price is good per ounce, better than the Badia brand I have gotten at Walmart. There ARE still hulls in the package that did not get filtered out, so if you are sensitive to them be aware of that. We like the added little crunchiness and extra nutrition they give so are not bothered by it. So 5 stars here. If you like a perfectly hulled version try the Badia brand, I found no hulls in that.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting fresh hemp seeds to add to any dish
customer_reviews.text: These seeds are to die for! mm mm mm Opening up the bag for the first time is just heavenly with the smell of freshly hulled hemp seeds. Wonderful freshness, high quality product and you can't beat the price! I use these on just about everything; smoothies, salads, rice/pasta dishes. I like to just scoop some in my hand and eat em just like that haha :) I've tried other hemp seeds before and they were no where near as fresh smelling and tasting as these and they always seemed to get funky rather quickly, while the nice strong bags that Just Hemp Foods delivers in keeps the seeds fresh for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Real Angel

customer_reviews.title: Good value for your money.
customer_reviews.text: I love hemp, with that said it's good to find a company that offers almost the same price but more for my money. Usually I can only get 8 ounces for 10 dollars in the supermarkets. This company is 13 dollars but it's 24 ounces. This is great because I'm vegan and it's my preferred source for omegas as well as protein so it's good to find a company I can order from regularly. I like the taste also, I add it to porridge, smoothies, fruit, yogurt, dressings and many other things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not much to them
customer_reviews.text: These seeds were much smaller than they seemed in the picture. Not much texture or taste. One of the few foods for which my husband expressed strong dislike.
customer_reviews.author: lifelong learner

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: I love Hemp seeds and use them all the time. I like the crunchy taste. These Hemp seeds from Just Hemp food are perfect to add on to salads and smoothies. I also use them on plain Greek yogurt, tastes great. It is 100% natural. It is a good source of Vitamins, Omega 3, 6 and 9. It also provides 9 grams of protein in 3 tbs. Use them in making cupcakes or muffins or just eat them raw. The package is resealable, so just press the edges and it seals the freshness.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I have never tried hulled hemp seeds and was a little hesitant, but these are great! I put them on top of my salads, in yogurt, a smoothie, my oatmeal or just to east a spoonful of. (can't say handful like pumpkin, sunflower or other seeds) They are really tasty with a sort of light nutty flavor to them. I will most definitely be getting these again!
customer_reviews.author: jcr

customer_reviews.title: favorite snack
customer_reviews.text: My favorite snack, it satiates you and you won't feel like snacking on horrible junk food
customer_reviews.author: Pulitzer

customer_reviews.title: If I don't get it again, it's because I eat too much of it!
customer_reviews.text: I had had things with hemp before, but not the actual nuts alone. It reminds me of pine nuts, which is nice because pine nuts are prohibitively expensive! I mixed it in with almond/coconut flour pudding and n'oatmeal, and it was good in both respects. I've mostly been eating it with a spoon, though...on it's own or with my bulletproof coffee, or with a fruit. Much recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Tabby

customer_reviews.title: Good for Fatty Acids 3,6,9
customer_reviews.text: Great in my smoothies. I have very bad neuropathy and have had a liver transplant. I get good 3, 6, 9 fatty acids from this product. I hope after using it for a period of time it may held the disabling effects of my neuropathy, I hurt 24/7, even with a strong pain medication and will try about anything to help with my bad disability.
customer_reviews.author: RE

customer_reviews.title: brewed decaf coffee or regular coffee or your favorite tea • 1 tablespoon MCT oil or coconut oil ...
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious little pearls. If you want to try something really yummy, try white chocolate Rocket Fuel coffee latte (from www.healthpursuits.com). Blend these ingredients in a high powered blender • 8 oz. brewed decaf coffee or regular coffee or your favorite tea • 1 tablespoon MCT oil or coconut oil • 1 tablespoon cacao butter (melted) • 1 tablespoon hemp hearts • 2-4 drops alcohol-free stevia, optional • 1 tablespoon grass-fed collagen
customer_reviews.author: J5Family

customer_reviews.title: flavor is quite bitter compared to other brand....
customer_reviews.text: So Hemp seeds should taste somewhere between a pine nut and a walnut. Like nutty with a little green taste to it (like a pine nut). This one has a very bitter aftertaste or bite at the end of it. I much prefer Manitoba brand (that I purchased from AmazonLLC as the seller). I will say that there was plenty of time to eat it before the expiration date would arrive, but I won't be doing that. Sellers I have purchased this from: Just Hemp Foods.
customer_reviews.author: Fargo

customer_reviews.title: Good staple with many uses.
customer_reviews.text: I load this up every morning while cooking my nitrate free turkey bacon and organic eggs. The wife is experimenting with this on some of her dishes and it is all good here too.
customer_reviews.author: John Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these hemp seeds several times. They are of very good quality and freshness. I will definitely buy again and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Manning

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I can't say I really knew all that much about Hemp seed before trying this stuff, so I can't compare it to another product, but I like it. The seeds are hulled, and they appear to be of good quality. When I mix them in with my green smoothies, they blend well. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Vox Libris

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and healthy little seeds
customer_reviews.text: This seeds help me with restless legs and spasms in my muscles (I tried other brand it was not as potent). Definitely buying again and highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Dana Biciti

customer_reviews.title: Tasty lil' morsels.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what it is about this brand but I find it better tasting than other brands so I have been seeking it out, store stopped stocking it so Amazon it is.
customer_reviews.author: Hubstermeister

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Since all the nuts have their own pros and cons, I mix all my nuts and dry fruits together namely, walnuts, peanuts, almonds, pumpkin seeds, hemp seeds, chia seeds and goji berry together and store in a glass jar. And I enjoy yummy taste with all the health benefits of those super foods. Hemp seed is really good for health and this hemp seed tastes really great and fresh. Previously I have tried Esutras Organics Hemp seed but they keep changing their price all the time. So I wanted to try this Just Hemp Foods and their quality is superb. I am glad that I tried Just Hemp Foods.
customer_reviews.author: anijor

customer_reviews.title: Lover these seeds...
customer_reviews.text: Man, I love these things, I eat a couple of teaspoons every morning before I go to the gym, and they quell the hunger while giving me a little energy boost. I eat 'em straight outta the bag, and I love the taste! I'm sure they'd be great in protein shakes also, but I have yet to get that done. I haven't tried other brands, but these are so good I'll stick with what I know. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: sway444

customer_reviews.title: fresh
customer_reviews.text: it's hemp, it was fresh. I liked it as much as anyone can like hemp.
customer_reviews.author: Leonid Klichinsky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.  Fresh and tastes delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Fresh and tastes delicious. I put it in my morning cereal and sometimes my yogurt. Has a delicate nutty flavor and so packed with nutrition! I believe it has helped heal my digestive issues. Will continue to buy this product regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Lavender24

customer_reviews.title: I can't really taste it (which is probably a good thing) but it adds plant protein
customer_reviews.text: I add this to my smoothies every day. I can't really taste it (which is probably a good thing) but it adds plant protein, omegas, and amino acids. I much prefer using something like this to protein powder because of all the chemicals and weird flavors in protein powder. I def recommend it if you're looking for some added nutrition to your diet!
customer_reviews.author: Ally C. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great mineral content!
customer_reviews.text: I love these because of the great mineral content. i add one table spoon to my smoothies in the morning. i sometime add these to my salad in the afternoon along with walnuts,pecans and croutons. you can eat these as is as well- there is no unique flavor that i can feel- hence, you can add it to almost anything. I alternate this with those with shells because i love to get the fiber content of the shells as well.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Taste great. I had never tried any hemp hearts and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because they are low carb. Taste great. I had never tried any hemp hearts and wasn't sure I would like them. They have a very nutty flavor. I am going to try making hemp butter out of some of them. I believe it will be a great peanut butter replacement since peanut butter is too high in carbs for me.
customer_reviews.author: ellen smith

customer_reviews.title: Good for you but high calorie count
customer_reviews.text: . Can be used to top cereal or sprinkle on a salad. Nutritional. It does have a lot of calories.
customer_reviews.author: JeanneOH

customer_reviews.title: Good brand, no annoying shells. Blends well in smoothies.
customer_reviews.text: Am really liking how they turn out in smoothies when I use 3 tbsp to re add back in fiber to offset any potential neurological flare ups from having the fiber separated from the sugar in fruits via the blending process. Takes away the annoying shells that only get stuck to glass and plastic when I put them in smoothies, as they never all fully get blended up even in high speed blenders. Good brand, think I'll be reordering after this one runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Dominick. S

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves this
customer_reviews.text: She’s a vegetarian and I bought this as an added ingredient to her salads. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty
customer_reviews.text: I expected them to be a larger seed. Kinda messy to eat. But they taste really good, good flavor!
customer_reviews.author: kathleen wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I tried a little bit of hemp seeds from a local grocery store and really liked it. That was the best price I could find for this amount, and it lasts forever. Good sealing of the bag, good product.
customer_reviews.author: Laysa Durski

customer_reviews.title: Great price and I will never be out of this ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price and I will never be out of this product. I have given up on the only health food store in Kailua-Kona.
customer_reviews.author: Mango

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product; horrendous packaging
customer_reviews.text: Hemp seeds are one of my favorite foods and the quality of these are great! The bag looks cute, but it doesn't open all the way, which is a HUGE pain when trying to measure out a serving.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia M

customer_reviews.title: Fast Service, Great Quality, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Had not used hemp before - hooked! Will purchase this again. Great in smoothies but I love it sprinkled on veggies, yogurt, the flavor is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amy N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a different hemp seed for review a couple weeks ago, my son and I loved them! Devoured them. They were a little costly, so when I saw this brand and that they are 100% natural with a size of 1.5 lbs. I jumped at it. Plus the great reviews. It's nutritional value has you using three tablespoons, but I only used one in my Greek yogurt. I think it would have been far too much otherwise. They are very tasty and come in a convenient,resealable pouch. I'm very happy I ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: B. Feely

customer_reviews.title: Hemp seeds thumbs up! Bag design thumbs down.
customer_reviews.text: The hemp seeds are fresh. My one pet peeve is the bag design. It doesn't open fully, so it's hard to get a spoon or measuring cup into the bag. You almost have to pour the seeds out, and that can be a mess.
customer_reviews.author: GothamLiving

customer_reviews.title: Very good hemp seeds
customer_reviews.text: These hemp seeds taste good, and they go well with a lot of things like adding in salads, or to mac&cheese, etc. Very easy way to get protein, especially if you don't have a heavy diet.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: Love Me Some Hemp Seed!
customer_reviews.text: who knew? The mineral content of this is a great add to my nutrition. Good source of protein as well. And it tastes great! I worried it would taste weird but I could eat them by the handful. I use them in my Shakeology to add some slower feeding protein and added potassium & other minerals. I take a water pill which leeches minerals so it's important to add more in.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl O

customer_reviews.title: Should be on everybody's shopping list.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product; I keep reordering it mostly to put in my daily smoothies or add to granola.
customer_reviews.author: Zuum

customer_reviews.title: Okay Seeds
customer_reviews.text: These hemp seeds are okay. I bought them to add protein to my diet. I store the bag in the refrigerator. Sometimes I smell what seems to be a little mustiness odor when I open the bag. Not sure if one can eliminate that entirely with a raw food product such as this? All in all I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Merci

customer_reviews.title: These seeds are all that and then some!
customer_reviews.text: These were such a great find. I'm not all that into the 'hemp' thing, but these seeds are even better than most seeds. The protein/mineral values are really really good! I was looking for magnesium and zinc when I found these. The healthy omega oils are exceptional. The price is great too! They taste like raw sunflower seeds, but with a more delicate crunch. They have become a staple on my cereal now.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Just Hemp.
customer_reviews.text: The bits of hemp seem finer than other brands that I am used to, but it tastes just like any other. It could just be me but I feel like I don't have as much energy from eating this brand versus others that I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony T

customer_reviews.title: ... for two years and when I use it everyday like I should it really helps to keep me feeling ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using hulled hemp seeds for two years and when I use it everyday like I should it really helps to keep me feeling full and it really does help my sugar craving. It also has a great taste. I use it in my hot cereals, salads and in my homemade salad dressings. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: C Walker

customer_reviews.title: Packed with flavor
customer_reviews.text: I use hemp seeds in all of my smoothies, and I've discovered that not all brands are equal. This brand is always fresh, the seeds are soft and fragrant, and they add a pleasant nutty taste to the smoothies. I even eat them by the spoonful now and then or sprinkle them on yogurt. I haven't had any weird, hard hulls in this brand, either. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Larissa Ione

customer_reviews.title: I am a 12 year diabetic and special k protein ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a 12 year diabetic and special k protein cereal with 3 table spoons of hemp seed actually lowers my glucose significantly. A diabetic eating cold cereal and lowering blood sugar, who would have thought this possible!
customer_reviews.author: tink

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT SUPPLEMENT for my diet!! I have had cancer twice and I have a hard time with wanting to eat as chemo my my desire for most foods go away... After a lot of research I am trying to add as much nutrition back into what I do eat and hemp seeds is one that will help me get there. I am very happy with my purchase, great taste!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time ever purchasing or using hemp. Luckily the product tastes great and came very well packaged
customer_reviews.author: Pen name

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and healthy
customer_reviews.text: I love this in my smoothies. Adds a nice flavor and fantastic health benefits
customer_reviews.author: MrBarnhart

customer_reviews.title: I like it, I use it in tabbouleh salad and ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it, I use it in tabbouleh salad and in kibbeh instead of bulgur. I also use it in my rocket fuel latte.
customer_reviews.author: sanieh

customer_reviews.title: fresh and tasty
customer_reviews.text: Good flavor and easy to eat as is, mix with other similar cereal type products, or use in smoothies. Get away from processed cereal! This is much better. Use a touch of sugar or honey if you must. I do.
customer_reviews.author: fuzzy logic

customer_reviews.title: Great for VEGANS packed with nutrients.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. The texture is great as is the flavor. I don't notice the flavor actually so its a nice addition to my smoothies. I did research and found that hemp doesn't need pesticides so other than what was on the soil the non organic is practically organic!
customer_reviews.author: Camilyyy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Very fresh and delicious. I am adding it to my gluten free bread.
customer_reviews.author: Inna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the wife like it i scored a point tastes like sunflower seeds
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff I am 67 with arthritis in the knees and tried this to help with the pain. It works great for me. The reviews I read here have been also beneficial to inform about the numerous benefits this seed has. I use 2 tablespoons each day.
customer_reviews.author: olecap

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff! This is a new product to me. I like the nutrition profile. The product consistency is similar in taste and feel to ground walnuts. I sprinkle it on breakfast cereal and oatmeal. It's also good in salads(lettuce or couscous/quinoa type stuff) and health bars too! Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Venditto

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting product
customer_reviews.text: I like the nutty taste, sprinkle over my food. Good in cooked cereal, especially. I don't eat much meat, so I resort to such foods as this Hemp for nutrition. I like the solid packaging, Put the bag right into the bottom shelf of the refrigerator between uses.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Less nutritious than other brands.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Didn't see any bad "seeds" so far. However, I realized that Manitoba hemp seeds have much better nutrient content and haven't felt the same benefits from eating these as I have those.
customer_reviews.author: v

customer_reviews.title: I love these Hemp Seeds
customer_reviews.text: I love these Hemp Seeds! I have been eating hemp seeds for quite a long time using various sources and brands. I have tried bulk purchasing as well as expensive packaging at vitamin stores. This is by far the best of everything. The freshness and flavor are outstanding. The quick turnaround of the order was extremely quick and very well packaged. I will continue to order this product indefinitely.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi

customer_reviews.title: Good food!
customer_reviews.text: Love the tast, love the health benifits. I use it in multiple dishes from salads to vegan toppings to smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Might be me, but not getting same boost as ...
customer_reviews.text: Might be me, but not getting same boost as with Hemp hearts brand. Maybe the soil grown in makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Aspire

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this
customer_reviews.text: Like the texture and the taste l. Use it in my protein shakes.
customer_reviews.author: Tess E

customer_reviews.title: can't get enough of this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and healthy seeds, highly, highly recommend. I use this stuff in my soaked oats, salads, baking goods and more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love them right out of the bag
customer_reviews.text: I love them right out of the bag. Very good quality product. Be careful though. They are loaded with fat, even though it's poly and mono unsaturated, it's still fat. So I only eat one serving at a time. The protein content is off the chart. I also use Hemp protein powder in my shakes.
customer_reviews.author: Keith D. Bolton

customer_reviews.title: I put them on my cereal in the morning and love the taste
customer_reviews.text: Those are totally yummy! I put them on my cereal in the morning and love the taste. Will definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: KAG

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I use it in my smoothies. Have ordered in the past and will continue to do so
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R. Seiter

customer_reviews.title: They taste good, are nutritious
customer_reviews.text: I eat these everyday. They taste good, are nutritious, and get you high (JUST KIDDING! ha) They're nutty and a little veg tasting, nice in cottage cheese. They do get stuck in your teeth, so brush (or at least rinse) before you head out the door.
customer_reviews.author: M. Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use this on my cereal or oatmeal. Sometimes I just eat a sponful for the nutritional benefits. I am a vegan and enjoy nuts and seeds as part of my health regimen. These Hulled hemp seeds are delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Regina M. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Very good! but now too expensive.
customer_reviews.text: This is very good, but now is too expensive. I purchased this Item in last October for $13.49. Today is $23.51 this is little too much amazon, Other resellers sells for around $15, so I go there to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.S.

customer_reviews.title: I found this product to be easy to ingest and digest
customer_reviews.text: I found this product to be easy to ingest and digest. Also, the price per ounce is tough to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty seeds
customer_reviews.text: These seeds taste very good. They kind of taste like nuts. My package did not have any stems or hulls in it, and the contents are very fresh. I add these seeds to practically everything, and eat them alone right out of the bag. They arrived quickly and were well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: So yummy and healthy
customer_reviews.text: These are soft with a nutty taste. I add to most dishes; sweet potatoes, stir fry, smoothies, quinoa...etc. Super healthy and it's a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: First time buying hemp but seems to be of high quality and I love the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L Todd

customer_reviews.title: ... the recipes on the package and turned out very good.
customer_reviews.text: Follow the recipes on the package and turned out very good.
customer_reviews.author: Inge

customer_reviews.title: Very good and good price
customer_reviews.text: Actually better than expected, I mixed in with bowl of instant Oatmeal. Very good, good flavor, next will mix in batch of brownies. They have vitamins in that are good for you.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Slightly nutty flavor use in oatmeal and salads. Also ice cream on rare occasions a tasty addition.
customer_reviews.author: Kane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hempseeds
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fresh. The price is slightly better than other brands and I am very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkelement

customer_reviews.title: I eat 3 tbsp with nothing like nuts everyday
customer_reviews.text: I eat 3 tbsp with nothing like nuts everyday. It tastes like pine nuts. In my case I don't like fish, and I have difficulty to eat fish oil, because after swallowing fish oil, I found there was bad smell left in my mouth. I tried to eat flax seeds, It also smelled. But hemp seeds is good to eat. I like it, I've recommended it to my families and friends. By the way I ordered on Apr.01.2016 and I got it has a expiration date till Mar.2017. In case someone may want to know about the expiration date like me .
customer_reviews.author: Sara Jeong

customer_reviews.title: Returning customer
customer_reviews.text: I love adding a few tablespoons of these to my daily lunch salads and not only do they taste geeat, they're a grear way to get some healthy fats. This is my second bag of these and I will continue to buy from here again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Marie

customer_reviews.title: I really like these hemp hearts but the price has gone through ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these hemp hearts but the price has gone through the roof. I was paying $13 a bag now they're $21. Not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Sinikel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great addition to my bread recipe. I'll be buying more really soon.
customer_reviews.author: btbuz

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. Already purchase multiple times. We add it to multiple foods, but my favorite is to add it to sour dough rye bread. It also makes a great snack. It comes in very convenient resealable packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

product_meta.title: Just Hemp Foods Hemp Hearts Shelf Stable Hemp Seeds, 24oz; with 10g Protein & 12g Omegas per Serving, Keto, Gluten Free, Vegan, Whole 30, Paleo, Non-GMO
feature_bullets: POWERFUL PLANT-BASED NUTRITION: At 10g Plant Protein per serving, hemp hears have two times more protein than chia or flax. These super seeds also offer 12g Omegas 3 & 6 and only 1g Carbs per serving!

ESSENTIAL VITAMINS & MINERALS: Hemp is a super seed packed with plant-based protein, healthy fats and other vital nutrients. Hemp Hearts are an excellent source of Iron, Niacin, Thiamine, Phosphorus, Magnesium, Manganese, Copper, and Zinc. Zinc contributes to the normal function of the immune system. Hemp Hearts are also a good source of Vitamin B6 and Folate. (*See nutrition information for total fat content)

VERSATILE & TASTY: Experiencing the benefits of hemp is easy. With a light, nutty flavor that complements almost any dish, Hemp Hearts are the perfect boost to any meal. Sprinkle Hemp Hearts on salad, cereal, yogurt or blend them into smoothies.
SHELF-STABLE & READY TO EAT: Manitoba Harvest raw shelled hemp seeds are shelf-stable and ready to eat, making them a must-have addition to any pantry.
A FIT FOR A VARIETY OF DIETS & LIFESTYLES: Non-GMO Project Verified, Keto Certified, Paleo Certified, Gluten Free, Vegan, Whole 30 Approved and Kosher

STRONG VALUES: At Manitoba Harvest we believe in cultivating the world in which we want to live. As a Certified B-Corp with a net zero carbon footprint, sustainability is at the forefront of everything we do

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
